content: अत्ययः [इ-अच्] {@--1@} ({%a%}) Passing away, lapse; काल° <ls>Ms. 8. 145.</ls> ({%b%}) End, conclusion, termination, absence, disappearance; तपात्यये <ls>Ku. 4. 44</ls>, <ls n="Ku.">5. 23</ls>; शिशिरात्ययस्य पुष्पोच्चयः <ls n="Ku.">3. 61</ls>; आतप° <ls>R. 1. 52.</ls> {@--2@} Complete disappearance, death, destruction, passing away, perishing; पितुरत्ययात् <ls>Dk. 64.</ls> {@--3@} Danger, risk, harm, injury, evil; जीवितात्ययमापन्नः <ls>Ms. 10. 104</ls> the life being in danger or jeopardy; प्राणानामेव चात्यये <ls n="Ms.">5. 27</ls>; प्राणात्यये च संप्राप्ते <ls>Y. 1. 179</ls>, <ls>Ms. 6. 68</ls>, <ls n="Ms.">8. 69</ls>; पुत्रदारात्ययं प्राप्तः <ls n="Ms.">10. 99</ls> (<ls>Kull.</ls> क्षुदवसन्नपुत्रकलत्रः). {@--4@} Suffering, misery, difficulty, distress. {@--5@} Guilt, fault, offence, transgression; क्षत्रियस्यात्यये दंडो भागाद्दशगुणो भवेत् <ls>Ms. 8. 243</ls>; दाप्योष्टगुणमत्ययं <ls n="Ms.">8. 400</ls> should be made to pay as a fine for his offence. {@--6@} Attack, assault <ls>Y. 2. 12.</ls> {@--7@} Overcoming, mastering mentally, comprehending; बुद्धिश्च ते लोकैरपि दुरत्यया <ls>Rām.</ls> {@--8@} Overstepping; क्षुरस्य धारा निशिता दुरत्यया <ls>Ken.</ls> {@--9@} A class, kind.
